Max Scherzer

Position: Pitcher

Bats: Right  •  Throws: Right

6-3, 208lb (190cm, 94kg)

Team: Toronto Blue Jays (majors)

Born: July 27, 1984 in St. Louis, MO us

Draft: Drafted by the St. Louis Cardinals in the 43rd round of the 2003 MLB June Amateur Draft from Parkway Central HS (Chesterfield, MO) and the Arizona Diamondbacks in the 1st round (11th) of the 2006 MLB June Amateur Draft from University of Missouri (Columbia, MO).

High School: Parkway Central HS (Chesterfield, MO)

School: University of Missouri (Columbia, MO)

Debut: April 29, 2008 (Age 23-277d, 19,292nd in major league history)
   vs. HOU 4.1 IP, 0 H, 7 SO, 0 BB, 0 ER

Rookie Status: Exceeded rookie limits during 2008 season

2025 Contract Status: Signed thru 2025, 1 yr/$15.5M (25)

Service Time (01/2025): 16.079  •  Free Agent: 2026

Agents: Boras Corporation

National Team: us USA (College)

Full Name: Maxwell Martin Scherzer

Nicknames: Mad Max, Blue Eye or Brown Eye

Pronunciation: \SHER-zer\

Instagram: @maxscherzer31

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Max Scherzer?

Max Scherzer is 40 years old.

When was Max Scherzer born?

Max Scherzer was born on July 27, 1984.

Where was Max Scherzer born?

Max Scherzer was born in St. Louis, MO.

How tall is Max Scherzer?

Max Scherzer is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much does Max Scherzer weigh?

Max Scherzer weighs 208 lbs (94 kg).

How many seasons has Max Scherzer played?

Max Scherzer is in his 18th season.

When was Max Scherzer drafted?

Max Scherzer was drafted by the St. Louis Cardinals in the 43rd round of the 2003 MLB June Amateur Draft from Parkway Central HS (Chesterfield, MO) and the Arizona Diamondbacks in the 1st round (11th) of the 2006 MLB June Amateur Draft from University of Missouri (Columbia, MO).

What position does Max Scherzer play?

Max Scherzer is a Pitcher.

How many strikeouts does Max Scherzer have?

Max Scherzer has 16 strikeouts this season and has 3,423 strikeouts over his career.

How much is Max Scherzer worth?

Max Scherzer makes $15,500,000.00 this year. His current contract terms are 1 yr/$15.5M (25).

How many teams has Max Scherzer played for?

Max Scherzer has played for 7 teams; the Arizona Diamondbacks, Detroit Tigers, Los Angeles Dodgers, New York Mets, Texas Rangers, Toronto Blue Jays and Washington Nationals.

How many World Series has Max Scherzer won?

Max Scherzer has won 2 World Series.

What is Max Scherzer's Instagram account?

Max Scherzer is on Instagram at maxscherzer31.

What are Max Scherzer's nicknames?

Mad Max, Blue Eye, Brown Eye are nicknames for Max Scherzer.
